modName: Boerthis ENB CoT Realistic lighting and DoF
summary:
Immersive and colourful ENB, with DoF
Climates of Tamriel compatible
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][size=50]BENB[/size][/b][/center]

I ve got a new ENB for RLO and CoT check it out: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31132]ColourWeatherOverhaul ENB[/url]

I´ve reuploaded the file without the Enbseries.dll and the d3d9.dll.
You need to download them from the [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm]official site[/url].

This are my ENB settings for those who know to install it.
For those who don´t know but want to know: read sharpshooters intall guide

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105]Sharpshooters ENB[/url]

ATTENTION: You need to activate the Esp files included in the data folder of the mod.
Load order: CoT; Green water fix for Water; Realistic lighting; Realistic lighting patcher

You will need the [url=http://www.enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0119.htm]original ENB series files[/url] by Boris Vorontsov.



This settings are based on Sharpshooters ENB, but i changed most of the values with the ENB-Customizer to make it look better and more immersive. Just see the images on top.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17400]ENB Customizer[/url]

Those epic sun effect seen above, you will only get with Climates of Tamriel wich I highly recommend.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17802]Climates of Tamriel[/url]
Please take the default settings or your night will be a bit too dark.

If you can´t see undrewater, try this ones:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13268]W.A.T.E.R.[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14007]Green Water Fix[/url]

Please note, that you will not get the same views as seen on my pictures cause I´m using nearly 50 texture mods, but your light effects will nearly be the same.

And of course don´t forget to endorse ;-)

Other mods and tools I recommend:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20801]Texture Pack combiner:[/url] Combines many texture Packs. Needs some time to downlad and save the Textures in the right folder, but it´s awesome.


[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24909]aMidianBorn Book of silence:[/url] In my opinion the best armor retexture ever.




[size=7][b]Please come back to endorse, and please post screenshots if you took some.[/b][/size]

Thank you for using my settings and excuse my english, I´m from Germany
author: boerthi
